name: SpaceShipEndlessScroll
description:
Want to play a game, where you can travel through other space, buying upgrades and boosters? This one is perfect for you!

This was designed for mobile, but I had a lot of troubles, trying to figure out, how to convert it to an app. You can play it on your browser, but only one version is available here. I know, I made UnderBox for Android and the format was APK, in fact, it's got harder to do, so enjoy 1.0 on any device (hopefully) pretty easy.

If you have some ideas, on what to add to SSES, tell in the comments (I don't take bad ideas).

Enjoy flying through any space you want!
